name: 2009 Pokemon Japanese Promo Advent Of Arceus 043 Pikachu M Lv.x Holo PSA 10 Gem Mint (0xa7a8...dd68)
description: RareMint Pokemon Genesis Mystery Pack (0xa7a891a42beff13df13293688780c39ec7642b8b20a57b7c5251a6c74443dd68) derived from the human readeable fingerprint of the physical item - which will be revealed at the same time as the NFT itself - using the Keccak256 cryptographic function. This unique identifier serves as a verifiable *Proof of Integrity* to certify that the corresponding physical asset is irrevocably associated to this NFT and vice-versa.
